title: Cod with mango and curry
description: Cod is fried and then wrapped in baking paper with mango to make a dramatic parcel of deliciousness to serve at the table with a coconut sauce.
ingredients: 1 firm mango, peeled, roughly chopped, stone discarded
1 small red chilli, halved, seeds removed, julienned
4 x 150g/5½oz cod loin, skin on, pin boned
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
100ml/3½fl oz whipping cream, lightly whipped, plus 2 tbsp cream
1 baby gem lettuce, cut in four
½ cucumber, peeled, seeds removed, in large julienne
